text:
Champions League
Bar√ßa: "The moment for Griezmann"
In the absence of Luis Suarez, the Frenchman will be one of Bar√ßa's strongmen in the company of Lionel Messi against Slavia Prague.
05 Nov 2019, 07:40 by Thomas Rassouli



The moment or never. The weekend of championship will have left serious consequences to Bar√ßa. Defeated by Levante, the Liga leader worried both by his game and by his state of mind. This communion of the group had already taken the lead in the wing with the soap opera Antoine Griezmann, the French having become the subject of debates in Spain as for its integration with the azulgrana group.
If his teammates do not make enough passes to his taste, however, the world champion will have the opportunity tonight to assert his status, in the absence of one of the leaders of the attack, Luis Suarez.




Demb√©l√© or Fati?




Antoine Griezmann + 8 üì∑Credit Photo - Icon Sport

Injured, the Uruguayan will have to leave his place. Messi and Griezmann should therefore be accompanied by a new entrant in the offensive trio. The two potential candidates are none other than Ansu Fati, new darling of the Camp Nou, or Ousmane Demb√©l√©, back in the group of Ernesto Valverde. For Griezmann whatever the choice of the coach, it is the day to shine, as puts it in One Mundo Deportivo.
